name: Zariel Tiefling
description: Tieflings sworn to Zariel, the archduchess of Avernus, are forged in the fires of war and are known for their martial prowess.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

traits.name: Hellish Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Legacy of Avernus
traits.description: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip. At 3rd level, you can cast Searing Smite once as a 2nd-level spell. At 5th level, you can cast Branding Smite once. You must finish a long rest to cast these spells again with this trait.
